snippet: The central bank decided to keep its benchmark interest rate level at a record low and hold its economic stimulus program steady.
abstract: Bank of England decides to keep benchmark interest rate unchanged at record low of 0.5 percent in the face of more evidence that country's economic recovery is gaining speed.
lead_paragraph: The central bank decided to keep its benchmark interest rate level at a record low and hold its economic stimulus program steady.

headline.main: Bank of England Retains Low Interest Rate
headline.print_headline: Bank of England Retains Low Interest Rate
